title: Villain—Suppressing the Protagonist and Stealing the Campus Belle from the Start
original_title: 反派：开局打压主角截胡校花
author: 反派雇佣兵
synopsis: Su Lin wakes up inside a novel as a villainous side character, only to discover the protagonist Ye Feng is about to be reborn in three days. Armed with knowledge of the entire plot and a Super Villain System, Su Lin races to outmaneuver the reborn protagonist at every turn—stealing his opportunities, winning over the heroines, and rewriting his own fate from cannon fodder to legend.

chapter_titles.1: Transmigrated into a Novel as the Villain?
chapter_titles.3: Asking the School Belle for Help
chapter_titles.5: Revealing the Truth—Xia Shiyu Is Stunned
chapter_titles.10: An Unusual Lin Xiaowan—Her Parents' Suspicions
chapter_titles.13: Su Lin Called It—She Really Came to Borrow Money
